text: Only Way Is Up is the debut studio album by American rapper K Camp. It was released on September 4, 2015, by Interscope Records. The album was preceded by the singles: "Lil Bit", "Comfortable" and "1Hunnid". == Singles == The album's lead single, "Lil Bit" was released on January 27, 2015. The album's second single, "Comfortable" was released on June 9, 2015. ==Commercial performance== The album debuted at number 20 on the Billboard 200 with 18,000 equivalent album units, selling 11,000 copies in its first week of availability in the United States. ==Track listing== *All writing credits found from YouTube * (*) indicates additional producer ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2015) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2015) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums (Billboard) | 98 |} == References == Category:2015 debut albums Category:K Camp albums Category:Albums produced by Honorable C.N.O.T.E. title: Only Way Is Up
